We are providing you with this Privacy Notice, which addresses the processing of employee data of EPAM employees by EPAM or third parties on behalf of EPAM, in order to explain our practices regarding the collection and use of, and any other processing activities with respect to certain individually identifiable information about you (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"personal information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") by electronic means and in systematically accessible paper-based filing systems.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Privacy Notice is deemed to provide you with information on the data processing activities with respect to certain personal data about you conducted by EPAM, being your employer, in its capacity as controller in accordance with the Bulgarian Data Protection Act.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For the purpose of this Privacy Notice processing shall mean any operation or set of operations which is performed on personal data or on sets of personal data, whether or not by automated means, including the collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, correction (update, alteration), retrieval, use, transfer (distribution, disclosure, access, cross-border transfer to foreign states that may not ensure adequate protection of rights of personal data subjects), depersonalization, blocking, removal, and destruction of personal data, with or without the use of automation technologies, or with a combination of automated and non-automated technologies. All processing operations are carried out in line with the applicable privacy laws, including the European Regulation 2016/679/EU (“\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GDPR\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
